All functions

Calculate R0 and Rc on an incidence dataset

Formating intervention parameters within a database

Calculate equilibrium state variables

get_prop_relapse()

Calculate proportion of relapses

R0 calculation

get_rc_vivax()

Rc calculation, with case management and vector control

Checks validity condition

incidence_day2year()

Converts daily incidence to annual

incidence_year2day()

Converts annual incidence to daily

ODE vivax model with case management, importation and vector control

Samples uncertainty in incidence and importation data

Simulate from equilibrium
